title: Mid-Roll Ads appear during Live Game Feeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is entitled to play a live/in-progress game
custom_steps: WHEN a user plays a live/in-progress game
custom_expected:
THEN mid-roll ads are played during commercial breaks
AND mid-roll ads do not play during the game outside the commercial breaks

title: Mid-Roll Ads appear during Archive Game Feeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is entitled to play an archive game
custom_steps: WHEN a user plays an archive game
custom_expected:
THEN mid-roll ads are played during commercial breaks
AND mid-roll ads do not play during the game outside the commercial breaks

title: Mid-Roll Ads Scrubbing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is playing a live or archived game
AND a commercial break is playing
custom_steps: WHEN a user engages rewind or fast forward
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to rewind or fast forward during the ad breaks

title: DAI requests stop after exiting a stream
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is entitled to watch video streams
custom_steps: WHEN a user exits a stream
custom_expected: THEN network calls to dai.google.com are no longer occurring

title: CCPA Parameter to DAI opt in/out - Live Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for Live game playback
AND the user has not opt'd out of CCPA
OR the user has opt'd out of CCPA

**NOTE:**
Launch the app in the browser and open the Network tab in DevTools. 
- For Legacy/DSS enter "us_privacy=1Y" in the search box of the Network tab.
- For DM5 enter "streams" in the search box of the Network tab.

Opt'd out test account: tvccpa@gmail.com / Password23 in both QA/PROD with MLBALL/SUBSCRIBERVOD

All other tests accounts should NOT be opt'd out
custom_steps: WHEN a user initiates playback of a live game
custom_expected:
THEN parameter us_privacy=1YYY is passed for users that have opt'd out
AND parameter us_privacy=1YNY is passed for users that have not opt'd out

**NOTE:**
us_privacy parameter will at the end of the dai request after the user initiates playback

title: CCPA Parameter to DAI opt in/out - Archive Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for Archive game playback
AND the user has not opt'd out of CCPA
OR the user has opt'd out of CCPA

**NOTE:**
Launch the app in the browser and open the Network tab in DevTools. 
- For Legacy/DSS enter "us_privacy=1Y" in the search box of the Network tab.
- For DM5 enter "streams" in the search box of the Network tab.
Opt'd out test account: tvccpa@gmail.com / Password23 in both QA/PROD with MLBALL/SUBSCRIBERVOD

All other tests accounts should NOT be opt'd out
custom_steps: WHEN a user initiates playback of an archive game
custom_expected:
THEN parameter us_privacy=1YYY is passed for users that have opt'd out
AND parameter us_privacy=1YNY is passed for users that have not opt'd out

**NOTE:**
us_privacy parameter will at the end of the dai request after the user initiates playback

title: IMA SDK is being used - Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LIVE game stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** 
IMA SDK supported platforms: PS5
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
custom_steps: WHEN entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools
custom_expected: THEN the "streams" call has "pubads.g.doubleclick.net*" as the request URL

title: IMA SDK is being used - Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an Archive game stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND a cmsId and a videoId is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** 
IMA SDK supported platforms: PS5
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
custom_steps: WHEN entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools
custom_expected: THEN the "streams" call has "pubads.g.doubleclick.net*" as the request URL

title: DAI API is being used - Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LIVE game stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** 
DAI API supported platforms: LG
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
custom_steps: WHEN entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools
custom_expected: THEN the "stream?cust_params*" call has "dai.google.com*" as the request URL

title: DAI API is being used - Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an Archive game stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND a cmsId and a videoId is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** 
DAI API supported platforms: LG
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
custom_steps: WHEN entering "stream" into the Network search of Dev Tools
custom_expected: THEN the "stream?cust_params*" call has "dai.google.com*" as the request URL

title: IMA SDK - Failed calls do not result in a video error - Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LIVE game stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** 
IMA SDK supported platforms: PS5
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
custom_steps:
WHEN network calls to "pubads.g.doubleclick.net*" are blocked
OR network calls to "pubads.g.doubleclick.net*" are failing
custom_expected:
THEN the stream continues to playback with no video error modal popping up
AND ads playback during ad breaks

title: IMA SDK - Failed calls do not result in a video error - Archive
custom_preconds:

custom_steps:

custom_expected:
THEN the stream continues to playback with no video error modal popping up

title: DAI API - Failed calls at stream start do not result in a video error - Live game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a LIVE game stream has adsEnabled equals true in the graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adsEnabled)
AND an asset key is is returned in the same graphql Preview/Response (data->initPlaybackSession->adExperience->adEngineIdentifiers)

**NOTE:** 
Enter "graphql" into the Network search of Dev Tools to find the initPlaybackSession
custom_steps:
WHEN network calls to "dai.google.com*" are blocked
OR network calls to "dai.google.com*" are failing
AND the user initiates playback of a Live game
custom_expected:
THEN the stream is able to playback with no video error modal popping up
AND ads playback during ad breaks

title: Failed calls to google (streams) does not result in a video error - SLIVE dai enabled true
custom_preconds:
GIVEN SLIVE request URL "https://dai.svod-fst.mlb.com/api/v2/playback-info/events/*" returns in the response dai: enabled: true
OR for MiLB games, request URL "https://dai.tv.milb.com/api/v2/playback-info*" returns in the response dai: enabled: true
custom_steps:
WHEN playback of the SLIVE/MiLB game is launched
AND network calls to the domain "pubads.g.doubleclick.net" are blocked
custom_expected:
THEN the stream continues to playback with no video error modal popping up
AND ads playback during ad breaks

title: DSS - Ads for local in-market streaming - In-Market
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a subscriber with in-market streaming entitlement
AND the user is in the viewing market of the team they are entitled for in-market streaming

**NOTE:**  This needs to be tested on a browser, with the Network tab of the developer tools open
custom_steps: WHEN the user initiates playback for an in-market game feed
custom_expected:
THEN "inMarket: true" is present in the MAST EPG v3 response within the videoFeeds node for the in-market team
AND "market%3Din-market" is present in the DAI request URL

title: DSS - Ads for local in-market streaming - Out-Of-Market
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a subscriber with or without in-market streaming entitlement
AND the user is outside the viewing market

**NOTE:**  This needs to be tested on a browser, with the Network tab of the developer tools open
custom_steps: WHEN the user initiates playback for an out-of-market game feed
custom_expected:
THEN "inMarket: false" is present in the MAST EPG v3 response within the videoFeeds node for the in-market team
AND "market%3Dout-of-market" is present in the DAI request URL

title: Ad breaks logged in DataDog
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to DataDog
AND is viewing Playback Heuristics in DataDog
AND a user is logged in with dm5tv3@gmail.com / PasswordDM5
AND has initiated playback of a Live ads enabled stream

**NOTE:** 
URL for Playback Heuristics: https://us5.datadoghq.com/logs?query=%22PLAYBACK%20HEURISTICS%22%20%40usr.id%3A00u24vtyge3Pzk2rY0h8&agg_m=%40event.metadata.currentBitrate&agg_m_source=base&agg_q=%40asset.isLive&agg_q_source=base&agg_t=avg&analyticsOptions=%5B%22line%22%2C%22dog_classic%22%2Cnull%2Cnull%5D&cols=host%2Cservice%2C%40usr.id%2C%40event.action%2C%40event.reason%2C%40event.metadata.convivaTimestamp&context_event=AY_CgMDtAAD8tvFqYXPtGgAB&fromUser=true&messageDisplay=inline&refresh_mode=sliding&storage=hot&stream_sort=%40convivaTimestamp%2Casc&top_n=10&top_o=top&view=spans&viz=&x_missing=true&from_ts=1726669870274&to_ts=1726684270274&live=true

The tester may need to update the User ID in DataDog to the Okta ID of the test user from the test environment.
custom_steps: WHEN a complete ad break plays
custom_expected:
THEN the following action and reason are logged in DataDog at an ad break start: 
Action - player_state_change 
Reason - player_ad_break_started
AND the following action and reason are logged in DataDog at an ad break end: 
Action - player_state_change 
Reason - player_ad_break_end
